user_input: Create a Premium commercial for a product in the style of Cinematic, 3D Render, Anime. Target platform: YouTube TV. Duration: 15s.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Experience tomorrow, today. In your grasp.

scenes.visual_prompt: A highly detailed 3D render, cinematic anime style, close-up hero shot of a 'Lumen X' holographic projector watch. It is deep obsidian black with subtle chrome accents, made of high-grade aerospace aluminum and sapphire glass, resting on a minimalist, textured brushed metallic surface. Cinematic three-point lighting with a soft key light highlights its sleek curves, reflecting subtle anime-style glow. Centered in the lower third, in safe zone.
scenes.audio_prompt: Subtle hum of advanced technology, gentle ambient synth drone.
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow, elegant push-in, subtle Steadicam drift.

scenes.visual_prompt: A highly detailed 3D render, cinematic anime style, featuring the same 'Lumen X' holographic projector watch from scene 1, now worn on the wrist of a 28-year-old androgynous individual in a sleek, futuristic charcoal grey tunic. A soft, ethereal blue holographic display emanates from the watch, projecting intricate data. Golden hour backlight creates a soft rim around the individual's wrist and the watch, with the holographic projection casting a subtle glow. Medium close-up on the wrist and the holographic projection, centered in safe zone.
scenes.audio_prompt: Gentle shimmering sound of the holographic projection, soft electronic beeps.
scenes.motion_prompt: Camera orbits slowly around the wrist, maintaining focus on the watch and holographic projection.
